paper_metadata.title: How debt and information about debt affect LMI taxpayers' asset-building strategies

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: This study was carried out to gain a more in-depth understanding of how debt and information about debt affect LMI taxpayers' asset-building strategies, with a particular focus on the planning and use of their tax refunds.
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: The study's mixed method design in examining how debt and information about debt affect LMI taxpayers' asset-building strategies provided structure to the research.

bonus_information.qualitative_evidence_citation: The findings from the qualitative analysis further illuminate the motivation of LMI taxpayers to engage in asset-building as well as the barriers that LMI taxpayers face

evidence_citations.country_citation: The United States, one of the wealthiest countries in the world, has a poverty problem
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: serving over 12,000 low-and moderate-income taxpayers annually
